fullName: Book Management API Validations: Create a book with cover image

labels.name: story
labels.value: Create a book with cover image

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Create a book with cover image

name: Create a book with cover image

steps.name: Given  a user signs up and logs in successfully
User Signup: expected 200, actual 200. User created successfully. Response: {"message":"User created successfully"}

User Login: expected 200, actual 200. Login successful. Response: {"access_token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJib29rZmxvd191c2VyXzE3NDkwMTYwMjkzODlAbWFpbC5jb20iLCJleHAiOjE3NDkwMTc4MzB9.Mcs7QV-o2KxpjSF-wtJN9lOQWkcc6Pkf7ex8QV-zxbI","token_type":"bearer"}
Given  a book payload with name "BookWithImage", author "Alice", year 2024, summary "With cover", and cover image "src/test/resources/sample.jpg" is prepared
Prepared book payload with image: Book{id=30769, name='BookWithImage', author='Alice', published_year=2024, book_summary='With cover', cover_image_url='null'}, image: src/test/resources/sample.jpg
When  user sends a request to create a new book with image
Book creation with image response: Status: 500, Body: Internal Server Error
